name: Add Products and Generate Invoice in IMS Application
description: Logs in, navigates to Product Master, adds 10 products, and generates a purchase invoice.

steps.name: Select Item Group as BODY CARE
Add 10 random products (first 5: inventory & ticked, next 5: service & unticked)
